rune.author: billythegoat101
rune.sacrifices: Sacrifice: -1xEnderEye + 5XP Notes: -Takes away 3 hearts upon every teleportation.
rune.description: Description: Creates a teleporation network location for other teleportation runes to teleport to. Will cost 4 hearts every teleportation. The teleportation network frequency on which to send you depends on the block beneath the blaze square in the rune design.
